mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BBSLIST ORDER BY NO DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBSLIST(nickName, university, dept, bookName, publisher, author, ISBN, costPrice, salePrice, view, status, day, title, content) VALUES (#{nickName}, #{university}, #{dept}, #{bookName}, #{publisher}, #{author}, #{ISBN}, #{costPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{view}, #{status}, now(), #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE BBSLIST SET UNIVERSITY=#{university}, DEPT=#{dept}, BOOKNAME=#{bookName}, PUBLISHER=#{publisher}, AUTHOR=#{author}, ISBN=#{ISBN}, COSTPRICE=#{costPrice}, SALEPRICE=#{salePrice}, STATUS=#{status}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE NO=#{no}
